net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Create Ext Database
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Execute this macro the first time Lib:O5e-MonsterSupplement is installed. It must be executed from the library map. The token it creates will be the Ext Database. This token must be located on each map you wish to edit the database from. Ideally, the GM has a "Monster" map where they build all of their monster tokens. Such a map is an ideal location for the Ext Database token to reside.
